name: Arcanus - A Journey To The Mirrored World
name_original: Arcanus - A Journey To The Mirrored World
description:
This short puzzle game is inspired by portal. This game was made for Weekly Game Jam 148. I thought that a game where you switch to a dimension that's similar but not quite the same, fit the theme 'mirror' quite well.

 WASD to move, LMB to switch dimension, E to pickup cubes.

It is better if you download the game, but that is annoying so I made it optional.
